original_text: And he is then also the father of the circumcised who not only are circumcised but who also follow in the footsteps of the faith that our father Abraham had before he was circumcised.
korean_text: 또한 할례자의 조상이 되었나니 곧 할례 받을 자에게뿐 아니라 우리 조상 아브라함이 무할례시에 가졌던 믿음의 자취를 따르는 자들에게도 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: And he is then also the father of the circumcised

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 단지 할례를 받았을 뿐만 아니라

sentences.original_text: but who also follow in the footsteps of the faith
